Click any thumbnail image to enlarge

Two Nintendo Super Famicom Video Game Consoles. These were released in Japan, for the Japanese marked. Lot includes 2 Super Famicom Video Game Consoles, one original box, 1 power cord, 4 game controllers and 1 TV connector cable. Both machines power on to a solid red light only, not further tested and sold as is. Items show average use/ play wear.


(Store: Troy)

Thank you for shopping with us. Goodwill Easter Seals Miami Valley's mission is to empower people with disabilities and other needs to achieve independence and enhance their lives. FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION PLEASE CALL (937) 528-6536. PLEASE NOTE THAT ALL PAYMENTS MUST BE MADE ON THE SGW SITE BEFORE WE RELEASE ANY ITEMS, WE NO LONGER ACCEPT ANY PAYMENTS AT OUR LOCATION. These dimensional weight rates are calculated by the carrier using a billable weight larger than the actual package weight.
